item.description:
Dear Westborough Spirituality Meetup group members,

How are you doing?
This month, one of our member is going to host a Tao Te Ching discussion. I am honored to tell all of our group members, we are all invited.

What is Tao Te Ching? This is an ancient book from Lao-zi who was a wise man and well-known philosopher. You may or may not know that this is top 3 world wise translated (to different languages) book. Inside has 81 chapter, each chapter is short, but meaning is deep.

Please notice that this time is not in my place, we are going to Joe's clinic in Quincy !!!

Date: 11-21-2009 (Saturday)
Time: 1:00 to 3:00

Chapter: 10
www.earlywomenmasters.net/tao/ch_10.html

Place : Joe's clinic (Tong Ren Center) (please read the long but very useful direction)
15 Cottage Ave, Quincy MA 02169


Looking forward to seeing you all there
Jonathan
================================================================
Direction:

BY CAR:

From Route 128 and Points West and North
Travel Route 128 South Take right onto Exit 18 - Washington Street/Braintree/Quincy Center.
Bear left onto Burgin Parkway at the fork. Go straight and at the fifth set of traffic lights, turn right onto granite Street.
You will see the stop and shop business building on your left.
At the next set of lights, there is a 5 way intersection.
Accross from you is Bank of America
Go accross the intersection down chestnut street, keeping Bank of America immediately on your right
Pass the first right, which is a 1 way, cottage ave - you don't want to go there
Take the second right, into a big parking lot which is across the street from the court house
Make your first right in the parking lot and go to the end and park around there. That is the Fours restaurant building, our building.
Go through the alleyway to the front of the building and enter and take the elevator to the 5th floor.

From Cape Cod and Points South
Travel Route 93/Route 3 North to Exit 19-Quincy Center/Quincy Adams "T"
Go straight onto Burgin Parkway at the fork. Go straight and at the fifth set of traffic lights, turn right onto granite Street.
You will see the stop and shop business building on your left.
At the next set of lights, there is a 5 way intersection.
Accross from you is Bank of America
Go accross the intersection down chestnut street, keeping Bank of America immediately on your right
Pass the first right, which is a 1 way, cottage ave - you don't want to go there
Take the second right, into a big parking lot which is across the street from the court house
Make your first right in the parking lot and go to the end and park around there. That is the Fours restaurant building, our building.
Go through the alleyway to the front of the building and enter and take the elevator to the 5th floor.

Quincy Locals
If you are familiar with Quincy Center and the Fours Restaurant, go behind the fours restaurant, park in the court house parking lot, and go to Cottage Ave and up the elevator to the 5th floor.
or -
Go down Burgin Parkway until granit street - turn right onto granite Street.
You will see the stop and shop business building on your left.
At the next set of lights, there is a 5 way intersection.
Accross from you is Bank of America
Go accross the intersection down chestnut street, keeping Bank of America immediately on your right
Pass the first right, which is a 1 way, cottage ave - you don't want to go there
Take the second right, into a big parking lot which is across the street from the court house
Make your first right in the parking lot and go to the end and park around there. That is the Fours restaurant building, our building.
Go through the alleyway to the front of the building and enter and take the elevator to the 5th floor.
